name: Isonade
description: The Isonade is a massive monstrosity characterized by its immense size and aquatic nature, capable of dominating its environment and deftly maneuvering through water.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate weather conditions and swallow creatures whole makes it a fearsome force in watery battles.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its territory in aquatic environments, using its strength and weather manipulation to maintain control.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other monstrous sea creatures or as a guardian of underwater realms.
environment: Found in aquatic environments, especially where it can manipulate weather conditions.
strengths: Exceptional physical attacks with high damage output, significant magical resistance, and the ability to control weather.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its strategic thinking and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes a powerful Bite attack and two Tail Slap attacks, capable of swallowing Large or smaller creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Influence Weather allows it to control weather conditions in its vicinity with ease.
senses: Presence of darkvision up to 90 feet and a high passive Perception of 19 enhances its awareness in aquatic combat.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Perception, showcasing its physical prowess and ability to notice hidden things.
additional_information: Deals double damage to objects and structures
Can swallow multiple creatures at once
Can emerge violently from water, dealing heavy damage
test_queries: massive aquatic creature with weather control
gargantuan sea monster that swallows prey
creature that influences weather in water
giant monster immune to cold damage
